医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
怀孕会引发深刻的大脑变化，增强母性本能和心理健康一项开创性的研究表明，怀孕会导致灰质体积呈 U 形模式，这是由荷尔蒙变化驱动的，并与母性依恋有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250119/Pregnancy-triggers-profound-brain-changes-enhancing-maternal-instincts-and-mental-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250119/Pregnancy-triggers-profound-brain-changes-enhancing-maternal-instincts-and-mental-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7ca31f16-0949-4c0a-b87f-036a415c2150 Sun, 19 Jan 2025 23:00:00 -0500 Pregnancy triggers profound brain changes, enhancing maternal instincts and mental health
科学家揭示直立人一百万年前就掌握了沙漠生存能力研究人员发现，直立人一百万年前就适应了坦桑尼亚的极度干旱条件，挑战了之前关于早期人类生态限制的信念。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250119/Scientists-reveal-Homo-erectus-mastered-desert-survival-one-million-years-ago.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250119/Scientists-reveal-Homo-erectus-mastered-desert-survival-one-million-years-ago.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=83ef3eec-b602-4701-b5b2-5557b79ea2e8 Sun, 19 Jan 2025 22:31:00 -0500 Scientists reveal Homo erectus mastered desert survival one million years ago
研究人员利用蚊子交配传播抗疟疾真菌研究人员开发出了转基因真菌，可以杀死通过性传播传播疟疾的蚊子，为针对室内和室外人群提供了一种有前景的解决方案。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250119/Researchers-utilize-mosquito-mating-to-spread-malaria-fighting-fungi.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250119/Researchers-utilize-mosquito-mating-to-spread-malaria-fighting-fungi.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5ca74d8e-6f63-41ce-8d34-57cda5755e56 Sun, 19 Jan 2025 22:00:00 -0500 Researchers utilize mosquito mating to spread malaria-fighting fungi
COMET 模型通过深度学习增强疾病预测研究人员开发了 COMET，这是一个深度学习框架，利用电子健康记录和组学数据来改进预测模型并揭示生物学见解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250119/COMET-model-enhances-disease-prediction-with-deep-learning.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250119/COMET-model-enhances-disease-prediction-with-deep-learning.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5f5fbda3-93f5-4532-a029-35173535226f Sun, 19 Jan 2025 21:27:00 -0500 COMET model enhances disease prediction with deep learning
麦卢卡蜂蜜与奥伊亚乐华蜂蜜：研究揭示了关键的抗氧化差异和健康益处研究比较了麦卢卡蜂蜜（MH）和奥伊亚乐花蜂蜜（OLH）的抗氧化特性，发现 MH 的酚类含量高出十倍，而 OLH 通过减少氧化应激和增强抗氧化能力而表现出卓越的体内抗氧化活性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250119/Manuka-vs-Ohia-Lehua-honey-Study-reveals-key-antibiotic-differences-and-health-benefits.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250119/Manuka-vs-Ohia-Lehua-honey-Study-reveals-key-antibiotic-differences-and-health-benefits.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8c093ca1-a03a-497b-be24-8512b8311f5c Sun, 19 Jan 2025 16:37:00 -0500 Manuka vs. Ohia Lehua honey: Study reveals key antioxidant differences and health benefits
随着治疗临床试验的开始，对罕见肝癌的新见解与许多罕见疾病一样，纤维板层肝细胞癌（FLC）对少数不幸的人发起猛烈攻击——在本例中是儿童、青少年和年轻人。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250117/New-insights-into-rare-liver-cancer-as-clinical-trial-for-treatment-begins.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250117/New-insights-into-rare-liver-cancer-as-clinical-trial-for-treatment-begins.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3fd121ac-b3f2-4f06-9ebc-955fd4656208 Fri, 17 Jan 2025 16:26:00 -0500 New insights into rare liver cancer as clinical trial for treatment begins
干细胞疗法有望恢复中风后大脑活动美国每 40 秒就有一人中风。对于最常见的中风类型（称为缺血性中风）的幸存者来说，只有约 5% 的人能够完全康复。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250117/Stem-cell-therapy-shows-promise-in-restoring-brain-activity-after-中风.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250117/Stem-cell-therapy-shows-promise-in-restoring-brain-activity-after-中风.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c589e49e-0fdd-4619-bb81-35a6a45687f0 Fri, 17 Jan 2025 16:18:00 -0500 Stem cell therapy shows promise in restoring brain activity after stroke
研究揭示 NSP4 在轮状病毒疾病严重程度中的关键作用贝勒医学院和合作机构的研究人员提高了我们对轮状病毒（儿童急性胃肠炎最常见原因）如何致病的了解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250117/Study-uncovers-key-role-of-NSP4-in-rotavirus-disease-severity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250117/Study-uncovers-key-role-of-NSP4-in-rotavirus-disease-severity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=426cee11-70b7-4002-b28c-2cebed25f39f Fri, 17 Jan 2025 16:09:00 -0500 Study uncovers key role of NSP4 in rotavirus disease severity
HIV疫苗反应的新发现揭示了令人惊讶的抗体行为许多疫苗通过向体内引入类似于病毒一部分的蛋白质来发挥作用。理想情况下，免疫系统将产生识别特定病毒的持久抗体，从而提供保护。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250117/New-discovery-in-HIV-vaccine-response-reveals-surprising-antibody-behavior.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250117/New-discovery-in-HIV-vaccine-response-reveals-surprising-antibody-behavior.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fdb2b056-ff7e-4d48-9fcd-e6b914ede140 Fri, 17 Jan 2025 15:59:00 -0500 New discovery in HIV vaccine response reveals surprising antibody behavior
绘制神经元 IL-1R1 表达图谱揭示大脑功能白细胞介素-1 (IL-1) 是参与炎症的关键分子，在健康和疾病状态下都发挥着重要作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250117/Mapping-neuronal-IL-1R1-express-reveals-insights-into-brain-function.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250117/Mapping-neuronal-IL-1R1-express-reveals-insights-into-brain-function.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=938c6fd6-4980-4c61-841f-53757e4d86f7 Fri, 17 Jan 2025 15:51:00 -0500 Mapping neuronal IL-1R1 expression reveals insights into brain function
